layout_rules: Use 'Oswald' font for all headings to maintain brand aggression.
Ensure all backgrounds are #09090b or darker. No light mode toggle.
Use Red (#dc2626) strictly for CTAs and accents. Do not overuse.
Input fields must be square (rounded-none) and dark.
Map filter: invert(90%) hue-rotate(180deg) to match dark theme.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure red text is only used on black if contrast > 4.5:1. Use brighter red (#ef4444) for text if needed.

universal_guidelines: Do not center everything. Use left alignment for body text to improve readability.
Use generous padding (py-20 or py-32) between sections.
Add a subtle noise texture to the background to avoid flat colors.
